mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u.username, u.avatar, u.nickname FROM artist a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.*, u.username, u.avatar, u.nickname FROM artist a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT a.*, u.username, u.avatar, u.nickname FROM artist a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
SELECT a.*, u.username, u.avatar, u.nickname FROM artist a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.status = #{status} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO artist (user_id, real_name, id_card, style, price_min, price_max, delivery_days, accept_types, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{realName}, #{idCard}, #{style}, #{priceMin}, #{priceMax}, #{deliveryDays}, #{acceptTypes}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE artist SET style = #{style}, price_min = #{priceMin}, price_max = #{priceMax}, delivery_days = #{deliveryDays}, accept_types = #{acceptTypes} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE artist SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE artist SET rating = #{rating} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE artist SET order_count = order_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
